Description: Spatial Biology Requires Resolution and Plex to Resolve Heterogeneity.  Emerging spatial profiling technologies are enabling high-plex molecular profiling in biological tissues and cells by preserving the spatial context of gene or protein expression. Introducing CosMx Spatial Molecular Imager (SMI), a spatial multi-omics solution enabling rapid quantification and visualization of up to 1,000 RNA and 100 validated protein analytes at single-cell and subcellular resolution of intact Formalin-Fixed Paraffin-Embedded (FFPE) and fresh frozen tissue samples.GeoMx® Digital Spatial Profiling platform quantifies whole transcriptomes in human and mouse tissues using a wide range of spatial profiling strategies and sample types.
SearchResultBody: ESP27. NanoString Technologies: Spatial whole transcriptome profiling and single cell high-plex imaging: Quantum leaps forward in studying cancer
Title: NanoString Technologies: Spatial whole transcriptome profiling and single cell high-plex imaging: Quantum leaps forward in studying cancer
